mapper.insert: insert into studio (studio_id, studio_name, studio_status, studio_createtime, studio_updatetime, studio_editor, studio_text, studio_updateman, studio_spare, studio_picture) values (#{studioId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studioStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studioCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studioUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studioEditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studioText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studioUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studioSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studioPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update studio set studio_name = #{studioName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studio_status = #{studioStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, studio_createtime = #{studioCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, studio_updatetime = #{studioUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, studio_editor = #{studioEditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studio_text = #{studioText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studio_updateman = #{studioUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studio_spare = #{studioSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studio_picture = #{studioPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where studio_id = #{studioId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select studio_id, studio_name, studio_status, studio_createtime, studio_updatetime, studio_editor, studio_text, studio_updateman, studio_spare, studio_picture from studio where studio_id = #{studioId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select studio_id, studio_name, studio_status, studio_createtime, studio_updatetime, studio_editor, studio_text, studio_updateman, studio_spare, studio_picture from studio
